sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.pdUwAmountFormulaSelect')"
                         @backTo="back"/>

    <!-- 产品信息 -->

    <el-form ref="form_formulaSearch" label-position="right" label-width="auto" style="margin-top: 20px">

      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col v-if="mark" :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.product')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ product.pdCode + ':' + product.pdName }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.pdUwSiType')" prop="pdUwSiType">
            <el-select v-model="pdUwSiType" disabled>
              <el-option v-for="item in pdUwSiTypeOptions" :key="item.value" :label="item.label"
                         :value="item.value"></el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>

      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('pdDiscountFormulaSelect.productDetailsType')">
            <cus-select v-model="params.eq_productDetailType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.specifiedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="params.eq_pdInfoId" clearable filterable>
              <el-option v-for="product in productOptionList" :key="product.id"
                         :label="product.pdCode + ':' + product.pdName" :value="product.id"></el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.specifiedCalcCode')">
            <el-input v-model="params.like_pdCalcCode" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8" style="text-align: right">
          <el-form-item>
            <el-button dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-search" size="small" style="float: right" type="primary"
                       @click="$refs.page.reload()">
              {{ $t('table.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.formula')"></cus-table-title>
    <el-table :data="tableData_formula" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row max-height="300"
              size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdgenlPaInfo.details')" align="center" width="80">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button dialog-disable="disable" size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdCode')"
                       align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCode" >
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdName')"
                       align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdName" >
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType"
                       sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.pdCalcDesc')" align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-paperclip" size="mini" type="primary" @click="associate(scope.row)">{{
              $t('form.select')
            }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <!-- 分页 -->
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="tableData_formula" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params" url="/pdtemp-pd-underwriting-amount-formula-select/base/searchUWFormula"/>

    <!-- 规则引擎公式定义弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-definition :attributeObj="attributeObj" :ruleDefinitionClosed="ruleModuleClosed"
                         :visible="formulaVisible"></cus-rule-definition>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {associate, findAllProductByDetailType} from "@/api/basicinfo/underwritingAmountFormulaSelect"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'underwritingAmountFormulaSelect',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    pdUwSiTypeForSelect: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: ''
    },
    mark: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: undefined
    },
    pdUwSiTypeOptions: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return []
      }
    },
    definingAmount: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      attributeObj: {},
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      formulaVisible: false,
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        current_pdBussId: this.definingAmount.id,
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdUwSiTypeForSelect.startsWith('FX') ? '41' : '42',
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      pdUwSiType: '',
      tableData_formula: [],
      productOptionList: [],
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        performType: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        visible: false
      },
      filters_pdCode: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
  },
  created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
    // 初始化核保保额类型
    this.pdUwSiType = this.pdUwSiTypeForSelect
  },
  watch: {
    tableData_formula() {
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      this.tableData_formula.forEach(val => {
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), val.pdCode)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push({
            text: val.pdCode + ':' + val.pdName,
            value: val.pdCode
          })
        }
      })
    }
  },
  methods: {
    ruleModuleClosed() {
      this.formulaVisible = false
      this.$refs.page.reload()
    },
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
        this.params.product = this.product
        this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.product.cType
        this.productDetailTypeChanged(this.product.cType)
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formulaSelect', false)
    },
    associate(row) {
      const param = {
        product: this.product,
        formula: row,
        amount: this.definingAmount,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let flag = response.data.flag
        if (flag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.$refs.page.reload()
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(() => {
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.$refs.page.reload()
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    },
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = undefined
      this.productOptionList = []
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = response.data
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
